fullText:
Bravura Shroud

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, shadar-kai, warlord class, Bravura Presence class feature
Benefit: Whenever an ally chooses to benefit from your Bravura Presence class feature, that ally gains concealment until the end of its next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual, Dragon Magazine 372, page(s) 10.
name: Bravura Shroud
